models.description: Microsoft's efficient reasoning model - Fast inference

notes: Total download size: ~65GB+ for all models
Models are downloaded to local Ollama cache
Individual models can be pulled with: .\StrategicKhaos-Operator.ps1 -pull <model>
All models run 100% locally - no cloud dependencies
Customize this list by editing models_config.json
